text: If essential oils are able to scavenge some free radicals , they can also act as anti - inflammatory agents , because one of the inflammatory responses is the oxidative burst that occurs in diverse cells ( monocytes , neutrophils , eosinophils , and macrophages ) . Phagocytosis of bacteria , which occurs during inflammation , is accompanied by a dramatic increase in oxygen consumption resulting in the formation of superoxide anion radical ( O 2
